AllMoves.Name: Mind Games
AllMoves.Description: "A psychologist plays the cards beofre the shuffle and the deal." - Amit Abraham. 15% crit.

AllMoves.Name: Mom Issues
AllMoves.Description: Maternal Misery. Debuffs Truth, Faith.

AllMoves.Name: Phallic Image
AllMoves.Description: Delicately etched into 98% of all high school surfaces.

AllMoves.Name: Pronouns
AllMoves.Description: "The pronoun is one of the most terrifying masks man has invented" - John Fowles

AllMoves.Name: Psychoanalyze
AllMoves.Description: "Psychoanalysis is the confession without absolution." - Germaine Greer. Chance to Roast.

AllMoves.Name: Therapy
AllMoves.Description: "Is this a woman thing? You ask me how I'm feeling. I tell you how I'm feeling, and now you're going to torture me with it." - Tony Soprano. Heals 100.

AllMoves.Name: Alumni
AllMoves.Description: This move is so post-game.

AllMoves.Name: Banana Dance
AllMoves.Description: If you want it, come and get it, bananana...

AllMoves.Name: Bylaws
AllMoves.Description: Bylaw-of-the-game: Section 4 Article 15: All active members must rush 'em all. Buffs Truth.

AllMoves.Name: Chapter
AllMoves.Description: True democracy, and all that it entails. Buffs Truth, Debuffs CTP.

AllMoves.Name: Circle Jerk
AllMoves.Description: A condition met when two or more vocal people refuse to reach a common ground. Debuffs CTP, Truth.

AllMoves.Name: Dab
AllMoves.Description: When you're proud, sometimes the best thing to do is pretend to sneeze. Buffs CTP, Chance to Smoke Out.

AllMoves.Name: Detonate
AllMoves.Description: Leading cause of concussion among college campuses. Chance to Intoxicate. 15% crit.

AllMoves.Name: Dick Dance
AllMoves.Description: Exactly what it sounds like.

AllMoves.Name: Disaffiliate
AllMoves.Description: One hit KO your membership. Chance to Instant DA the opponent.

AllMoves.Name: Hash
AllMoves.Description: Everyone loves cleanup duty! Chance to Plague. Debuffs Courage, CTP.

AllMoves.Name: Oath
AllMoves.Description: Know it or blow it. Chance to Suspend.

AllMoves.Name: Pass Out
AllMoves.Description: Work hard, play hard, sleep hard. Heals all Delt's health, but they fall asleep.

AllMoves.Name: Philanthropy
AllMoves.Description: JDRF is where all proceeds of DTD's philanthropies go to. They work to solve Juvenile Diabetes. 15% crit.

AllMoves.Name: Pin
AllMoves.Description: How to assert your dominance over young'uns. Damage is difference in pin number, unless opp pin is higher.

AllMoves.Name: Rush
AllMoves.Description: Gotta rush 'em all! Chance to rush wild Delt!

AllMoves.Name: Shasta
AllMoves.Description: So trashy #wannaDoSomeBlowMan? Intoxicates on hit.

AllMoves.Name: Shotgun
AllMoves.Description: Tilt, puncture, and hope you can stomach some carbonation. Chance to Intoxicate.

AllMoves.Name: Sleep In
AllMoves.Description: Sometimes no matter how many alarms you set, 3 hours of sleep won't cut it. Chance to make fall Asleep.

AllMoves.Name: Snek
AllMoves.Description: Snitch onto others as you would have other snitch onto you. Debuffs Faith, CTP. Buffs Truth.

AllMoves.Name: Study Tables
AllMoves.Description: Gotta make that term GPA! Heals 55.

AllMoves.Name: Yak
AllMoves.Description: And rally. Chance to Plague. Debuffs CTP.
